type: Tutorial Step - My Only Friend, The End!

definition.text: Ok, my friend, this is the end! I hope you've enjoyed the show and that I've managed to get you hooked to Superalgos!

paragraphs.text: There's no doubt in my mind that you haven't seen anything like Superalgos before, have you?

If you're ready to keep going, my friend the Basic Education Tutorial will complete your understanding on some basic aspects of the system you need to master before you set out to learn how to build Trading Systems!
We're done! Click Next to finish with me and click Play on the next tutorial when you are ready!
